ring round (somebody).translation[0].def: to make telephone calls to a group of people, in order to organize something, find out information etc
I’ll ring round to see whether anyone’s interested in coming with us.
She rang round all the agencies.

I’ll ring round to see whether anyone’s interested in coming with us.
She rang round all the agencies.
